descriptionHtml:
This conversion was made by esmm40 who PM'd me the converted meshes so I can add them to this thread. Thanks!

Required mods:
ADEC Nordic Carved Armor
Dragonborn DLC
UNP BLESSED BODY UNPB (choose a version with BBP)
DIMONIZED UNP female body

How to install:
Intall the required mods (except the ADEC body mod!)
Drop the contents of this archive in SkyrimDatameshesdlc02armornordiccarved. Overwrite when asked

How to get it:
Craftable on nordic? section
author: b3lisario
